name: Caged Bird
description:
Help the caged bird escape!

The caged bird has just escaped from its cage, and is planning to fly back to the forest. Please help it!

How to play?

This is a game inspired by Flappy Bird, so just click your mouse like what you do in Flappy Bird.

Sound effect files are downloaded on the following websites.

https://freesound.org/people/brennanium135/sounds/360302/

https://freesound.org/people/schots/sounds/382735/

https://freesound.org/people/xFromarge1/sounds/509303/

https://freesound.org/people/Luke100000/sounds/513713/
